en: I will bless Jehovah at all times: His praise shall continually be in my mouth.
hmr: Ienglai khawmin LALPA chu inpâk ka ta, Ama inpâkna chu ka bauah suok rawp a tih.

en: My soul shall make her boast in Jehovah: The meek shall hear thereof, and be glad.
hmr: Ka hringna hin LALPA chu sawng a ta, Mi rimsihai chun chu chu hrieng an ta, lâwm an tih.

en: Oh magnify Jehovah with me, And let us exalt his name together.
hmr: Aw LALPA chu mîn pâkpui unla, A hming chu chawimawi seng ei tiu.

en: I sought Jehovah, and he answered me, And delivered me from all my fears.
hmr: LALPA chu ka zawng a, chun, ama chun a mi dawn a. Ka iṭi po poa inthawk chun a mi sanhim tah.

en: They looked unto him, and were radiant; And their faces shall never be confounded.
hmr: Ama an en a, chun, an hung var suok tah a, An hmêlhai chu iengtika khawm inzak naw ni.

en: This poor man cried, and Jehovah heard him, And saved him out of all his troubles.
hmr: Hi mi rimsi hi a khêk a, LALPA chun a lo hriet a, A lunginzîngna po poa chun a sansuok tah a.

en: The angel of Jehovah encampeth round about them that fear him, And delivereth them.
hmr: Ama ṭîtuhai chu an vêla chun LALPA vântirko chun a um nghah a. A sanhim hlak.

en: Oh taste and see that Jehovah is good: Blessed is the man that taketh refuge in him.
hmr: Aw LALPA ṭhatzie chu intem sin hrim ta u: Amaa ringna innghattu chu a hamṭha.

en: Oh fear Jehovah, ye his saints; For there is no want to them that fear him.
hmr: Aw, a mi inthienghai, LALPA chu ṭi unla, Ama ṭîtuhai ta ding chun tlâksamna hrim hrim a um si nawh.

en: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger; But they that seek Jehovah shall not want any good thing.
hmr: Sakeibaknei vânglaihai chu an tlasamin an phîng a ṭâm hlak a: LALPA zawngtuhai ruok chun thil ṭha hrim hrim tlasam naw ni hai.

en: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of Jehovah.
hmr: Hung ro, naupanghai ka thu ngai ta u, LALPA ṭi dân lo inchûktir ka ti cheu.

en: What man is he that desireth life, And loveth many days, that he may see good?
hmr: Thilṭha a hmu theina dinga hringna dita, Dam sâwt ngaina mi chu tu am a na?

en: Keep thy tongue from evil, And thy lips from speaking guile.
hmr: I lei chu suola inthawkin vêngṭha la, I hmûr chu hlêmna thu hril lo dingin.

en: Depart from evil, and do good; Seek peace, and pursue it.
hmr: Suol chu fe san la, thil ṭha thaw rawh; Inremna zawng la, a hnawtin hnawt rawh.

en: The eyes of Jehovah are toward the righteous, And his ears are open unto their cry.
hmr: LALPA mit chun mi felhai tieng a en hlak a, Ama chun an khêk hre dingin a ngai zing hlak.

en: The face of Jehovah is against them that do evil, To cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
hmr: LALPA hmêl chun thil suk- suoltuhai chu a do hlak a, Anni hriet zingna chu hnuoia inthawka sukbohmang dingin.

en: The righteous cried, and Jehovah heard, And delivered them out of all their troubles.
hmr: Mi felhai chu an khêk a; LALPA chun a lo hriet a, An lunginzîngna po poa chun a sansuok tah a.

en: Jehovah is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart, And saveth such as are of a contrite spirit.
hmr: LALPA chun lungrila lung- riem ithlâkhai chu a hnai hlak a, Lungrila insîrhai po chu a sandam hlak.

en: Many are the afflictions of the righteous; But Jehovah delivereth him out of them all.
hmr: Mi fel rinumnahai chu a tam a, Nisienlakhawm, chuong po poa chun LALPAIN a sansuok hlak.

en: He keepeth all his bones: Not one of them is broken.
hmr: A ru po po a vawng ṭhah a, Pakhat khawm sukthliek a ni nawh.

en: Evil shall slay the wicked; And they that hate the righteous shall be condemned.
hmr: Thil ṭha nawin mi rilohai chu sukhlum a ta, Mi fel theidatuhai chun thiemnaw chang an tih.

en: Jehovah redeemeth the soul of his servants; And none of them that take refuge in him shall be condemned.
hmr: LALPA chun a siehlawhai hringna chu ân tlan hlak a, Amaa ringna innghattuhai chu pakhat khawm thiemnaw chang um naw ni hai.
